annoGroup.heading: History
annoGroup.annotation: as added Mar. 8, 2007, D.C. Law 16-234, § 14, 54 DCR 377

annoGroup.heading: Emergency Legislation
annoGroup.annotation: For temporary (90 day) repeal of section, see § 1012(a) of Fiscal Year 2012 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2011 (D.C. Act 19-93, June 29, 2011, 58 DCR 5599).

annoGroup.heading: Delegation of Authority
annoGroup.annotation: Delegation of Authority-Green Building Act of 2006, see Mayor’s Order 2007-206, September 21, 2007 ( 55 DCR 125).

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.annotation: Section 48 of D.C. Law 19-171 amended subsection (a) of this section as it existed prior to its repeal.
